dmca.title: J.D. Power protests reference to its ratings on criticism site
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

It has been brought to our attention that the Mitsubishi Sucks Web site, www.mitsubishisucks.com, is displaying information derived from Power Circle Ratings on the J.D. Power Consumer Center.  Information posted on the J.D. Power Consumer Center is copyrighted information owned by J.D. Power and Associates. Use of the Consumer Center Power Circles is not permitted without the express prior written permission of J.D. Power and Associates. Perhaps this was a simple oversight or a misunderstanding, but your use of our name and information based on Power Circle Ratings in this manner infringes on our service marks.

It is often assumed by many organizations that J.D. Power and Associates' name and information may be used for promotional purposes. All J.D. Power and Associates information, including our name and service marks, is owned by our company. Only those companies who license the Power Circle Ratings may use our name and the Ratings on their Web site. Furthermore, J.D. Power and Associates must first approve the layout and verbiage associated with Power Circle Ratings prior to public viewing.  

In the hopes of preventing further infringement of our service marks, we request a signed letter, to be received by November 15, 2005 stating that you will discontinue use of this material, and any other marketing, advertising, and/or promotional material referencing the J.D. Power and Associates' name or service marks. This letter may be sent via fax to [private]. 

Your cooperation is greatly appreciated. Please feel free to call me if you have any questions regarding the licensing guidelines of J.D. Power Consumer Center Power Circles.

Sincerely,

_________________________________________________________________________
[private]
Consumer Center Specialist, Corporate Communications
J.D. Power and Associates 
[private]
Westlake Village, CA 91361
[private] | [private] fax | [private]@jdpa.com 
__________________________________________________________________________
A Global Marketing Information Firm 
Detroit | Los Angeles | New York | Phoenix
London | Munich |  Singapore | Shanghai | Sydney | Tokyo | Toronto

 

*****************************************************************

This e-mail and any files transmitted with it are confidential
and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to
which they are addressed. If you have received this in error,
you must not use or disseminate any information contained in it.
Please send it back to the person who sent it to you and delete
it from your system. This footnote also confirms that this e-mail
message has been swept by Sybari's Antigen for the presence of
computer viruses. However, we cannot guarantee that this trans-
mission is virus free, nor can we guarantee that this e-mail is
secure or error-free as information could be intercepted,
corrupted, lost, destroyed, or arrive late or incomplete. J.D.
Power and Associates therefore does not accept liability for loss
or damage suffered as a result of this transmission or for any
errors or omissions in the contents of this e-mail.

*****************************************************************
